name: xkcd Tribute - Pong
description:
Description

Game adaptation of a Randall Munroe's webcomic (https://xkcd.com/117/), made for the "xkcd jam". I think this is one of my smallest and fastest projects in time, and I really hope someone enjoys it. :)

Controls

- Swipe with click or press right to advance.

- Click on options to chose.

Credits

"Mega Hyper Ultrastorm", "ZigZag"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
